summary:
Sherlock Holmes is a famous fictional detective created by British author Arthur Conan Doyle. He is known for his amazing skills in solving mysteries using observation and clever thinking. The character first appeared in a book in 1887 and became very popular through stories in a magazine. These tales showed Holmes investigating different cases, often with his friend Dr. Watson.

Sherlock Holmes is one of the most well-known literary characters, appearing in many movies, TV shows, and other media. People love him so much that some even believe he was a real person!
title: Sherlock Holmes
